title: Re-appointments to the Hospital Authority
content_text:
p>
	The Government announced today (April 1) the re-appointment of two serving 
	members, Professor Francis Chan Ka-leung and Ms Anita Cheng Wai-ching, to 
	the Hospital Authority (HA) for a term of two years with effect from today. The Secretary for Food and Health, Dr Ko Wing-man, welcomed the 
	re-appointments and said he believed that Professor Chan and Ms Cheng will 
	continue to give valuable advice and contributions to the HA. The HA comprises a chairman, 23 non-official members, three public officers

and one principal officer from the HA. The membership list is as follows: Chairman:
Professor John Leong Chi-yan Non-official Members:
Mr William Chan Fu-keung
Professor Francis Chan Ka-leung
Ms Anita Cheng Wai-ching
Ms Chiang Lai-yuen
Ms Quince Chong Wai-yan
